news.title: Mohali civic body collects Rs 1.75 crore property tax from defaulters
news.para: MC Commissioner Navjot Kaur said, “We are now strict against defaulters. We have been giving them ample laxity by extending rebate dates, but the defaulters failed to deposit the tax even then.

news.title: Demand for solar panels rising among residents of Allahabad
news.para: Estimated that around 8% of total 2.25 lakh houses have installed the solar power panels to reduce their electricity bills, more and more house owners are connecting with dealers trading in solar power panels to get it installed on roofs of residential units.

news.title: Around 50% citizens in Nashik pay property tax online
news.para: In FY 2022–23, the civic body collected Rs 188 crore in property tax, out of which Rs 78 crore was paid online by the taxpayers.

news.title: Government allocates Rs 500 crore for Delhi Metro
news.para: Atishi said in her address that around 24 lakh passengers travelled daily in the metro in 2014. Today, more than 60 lakh passengers use the service every day.

news.title: Bengaluru: BMRCL awards contract for purple line extension
news.para: The objective is to improve train operations by providing a train reversal crossover-track facility. The contract also includes building a 28 metre extension of the under construction Whitefield Depot’s third line.

news.title: Property tax in Delhi can be paid on any day till March 31
news.para: So far, MCD has collected Rs 1,811 crore as property tax from nearly 11.5 lakh taxpayers. Last year,13.2 lakh taxpayers had paid property tax.

news.title: Implement already processed master plan 2031: Bhopal citizens forum
news.para: Not opposed to a newer development plans that would come about coming years, BCF representatives stressed further delay in implementation of Bhopal master plan, 2031 is undesirable.

news.title: Navi Mumbai civic body presents its first development plan to government for nod
news.para: The approval process for the development plan under the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966, Section 26(1), was initiated on August 10, 2022. The proposed plan has 16,194 suggestions and objections received from residents and organisations.

news.title: Kolkata civic body to offer extra FAR, remove building height cap in exchange for land gift
news.para: The KMC buildings department proposes to offer extra FAR to those who will donate land to make the adjacent road wider.

news.title: Cushman & Wakefield to design layout for phase 1 of fintech hub near Noida airport
news.para: The firm, which submitted a proposal to the Yamuna Authority recently, also proposed to allocate 10% of the land parcel for allied commercial services.

news.title: Mahindra Lifespaces plans to build projects pipeline worth Rs 45,000 crore in five years
news.para: Mahindra Lifespace Developers is looking to focus on joint developments, housing society redevelopments, and the acquisition of land parcels on an outright basis to augment its gross development value (GDV) during this period.

news.title: Nagpur buildings looks to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050
news.para: ZCBAP includes a holistic roadmap covering public buildings, government-led affordable housing, commercial buildings as well as homes, and an implementation strategy to achieve net-zero buildings across Nagpur by 2050.

news.title: Bombay HC dismisses Supreme Construction director’s petition
news.para: Bombay high court dismisses builder Lalit Tekchandani's petition to club and quash FIRs against him for allegedly duping over 1700 flat purchasers in Taloja, Navi Mumbai. The petition is dismissed by Justices Prakash Naik and Nitin Borkar.

news.title: Macrotech Developers to raise funds through QIP
news.para: The floor price based on the pricing formula as prescribed under Regulation 176(1) of the SEBI ICDR Regulations is Rs 1,129.48 per equity share. Macrotech Developers may offer a discount of not more than 5% on the floor price so calculated for the issue.

news.title: China Vanke stock, bonds resume their sell-off on liquidity concern
news.para: China Vanke's Hong Kong-listed shares fell 7.1%, having finished last week down 8.1%. The developer's Shenzhen-listed shares lost 4.7%, exacerbating last week's 3% decline.

news.title: Godrej Properties to develop township project in Bengaluru
news.para: Spread across ~62 acres, the project will offer about 5.6 million sq ft of saleable area comprising primarily residential apartments of various configurations.

news.title: Chicago: 'Mansion taxes' to fund homeless services stuck in legal limbo
news.para: Such citywide ballot measures are rare in the nation's third-largest city, but other cities, including Los Angeles, have approved similar so-called "mansion taxes."

news.title: Maharashtra CM lays foundation of Mumbai metro line-12
news.para: Metro Line 12 incorporates a completely elevated structure with 19 stations along the 22.173 km route. The estimated cost of this project, expected to be completed by end-2027, is around Rs 5,865 crore, as per an official release.
